attributes.additional_details: save our pcsos in Tilbury and surrounding areas please if you agree with this then sign and lets keep our pcsos on our streets

rejection.details: The e-petitions process is designed to allow individuals to raise issues about Government policy. The matter that you have raised is a local issue. If your intention is that the Government should change the policy allowing local agencies to do this, then please make that clear and resubmit the petition.
